views.markdown:
Added support for A12 device. Added support for iOS 10.
Added support for iPhone 7 and 7 Plus.
1. Added support for iOs 9.1 and above.
2. Delete Contact's settings in settings app redesigned with new appearance.
3. Fixed some of the users not able to register due to network issues.
4. Requires iOS 8.0 and above.
Whats new in 1.4.2:
======================
1. Fixed iPad compatibility issues such unable to delete via swipe delete, multiple contact delete, etc.
Change Log, 1.4.1:
=====================
1. Added support for iOS 9.x
2. Added support for iPhone 6s & 6s Plus.
Change Log 1.4:
=========================
Added support for iOS 8.3 and 8.4
Added support for iOS 7.1.X Now compatible with iOS 7 too. 1. Swipe Delete issue fixed in iOS 6.1.
2. Few performance optimizations.

1. Fully iOS 6.1 compatibility
2. Now supports iPad Mini too
